net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.html

Interface NDE

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassPathResourceLibraryHelper.ImmutableNDE, FactoryNDE, StringNDE, URINDE

    public interface NDE
extends Serializable, Cloneable
    A NDE represents a Non-Data Element, such as CSS or JS.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      Get the type.

      • getResource

        net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.Resource getResource()
        Get the resource that represents the NDE.

        May be null if not support. One of getURI(Boolean) or getResource() or both must return a non-null value.

        Returns:
        the resource.

      • getType

        NDEType getType()
        Get the type.
        Returns:
        the type.

      • getURI

        URI getURI(@Nullable
         Boolean secure)
        Get the URL that represents the resource.

        May be null if not support. One of getURI(Boolean) or getResource() or both must return a non-null value.

        Parameters:
        secure - pass in true to return a secure URL if you possible. Pass in null if you are unsure.
        Returns:
        the URI.

      • isUseInline

        boolean isUseInline()
        Flag that indicates whether or not the NDE should be added inline or referenced as a URL.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • setDependencies

        void setDependencies(List<NDE> ndes)
        Set a list of dependent NDEs.
        Parameters:
        ndes - the NDEs.

        Set the identifier.
        Parameters:

        Parameters:
